chart_description: This chart displays the number of TCP segments that were retransmitted per second on a Windows system. TCP retransmission can occur due to network congestion or errors in data transmission. Monitoring this chart can help identify potential network issues and aid in troubleshooting.

dimension_descriptions.ipv4: This dimension displays the number of TCP segments retransmitted over IPv4 protocol.
dimension_descriptions.ipv6: This dimension displays the number of TCP segments retransmitted over IPv6 protocol.
